Class AbstractMC

source code

     object --+    
              |    
AbstractSampler --+
                  |
                 AbstractMC
Known Subclasses:
  • singlechain.AbstractSingleChainMC
  • , multichain.AbstractEnsembleMC

Abstract Monte Carlo sampler class. Subclasses implement various Monte carlo equilibrium sampling schemes.
